feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence entries describing required frontend refactors, affected files, components, and test identifiers.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for many frontend files documenting their purpose, behavior, and architectural notes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining custom theme variables and light/dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML root file that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/public/.well-known/ii-alternati: Specifies allowed alternative origins for Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the full TanStack Router tree including public and admin layouts, pages, and the product-detail dynamic route.

Modal for creating multiple categories at once, parsing newline-separated input and previewing assigned orders before saving.

frontend/src/components/CookieConsent.ts: Cookie consent banner that stores user choice in localStorage and shows animated accept/decline options.
frontend/src/components/DashboardCards.t: Grid of navigation cards linking to admin sections, each with icon, description, and gradient styling.

frontend/src/components/DashboardHome.ts: Dashboard landing page showing welcome text and the admin navigation cards.
Layout wrapping dashboard pages with header, sidebar, responsive sidebar behavior, and footer.
frontend/src/components/DeleteConfirmDia: Renders a generic delete confirmation dialog with title, description, and loading-safe confirm/cancel actions.
frontend/src/components/DeleteProductDia: Displays a product deletion dialog requiring a specific password before calling the async confirm handler.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Shows store info, contact details, and social links using store data with formatted phone numbers.
frontend/src/components/HeaderSearch.tsx: Implements a debounced product search input that triggers actor-based search requests and navigates to results.
frontend/src/components/home/CategoriesD: Loads and displays categories incrementally with infinite scroll and mobile/desktop adjustments.
frontend/src/components/home/CategorySec: Shows a category header and a product grid, linking to a full category view if large.
frontend/src/components/home/ProductCard: Displays clickable product card with image loading fallback, featured badge, and stock badge.
frontend/src/components/home/ProductGrid: Grid layout showing a limited number of products depending on screen size.
frontend/src/components/home/ProductImag: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.

frontend/src/components/ImageLightbox.ts: Empty placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSpinner.t: Full‑screen loading view with a spinning icon and permission verification message.
frontend/src/components/LoginInterface.t: Provides a login screen using Internet Identity with styled UI and a login button showing loading state.
frontend/src/components/MobileMenu.tsx: Creates a slide‑in mobile navigation menu with category listing, navigation links, and scroll/escape handling.
frontend/src/components/pages/AdminUsers: Admin interface for listing users, filtering, adding administrators, and managing role changes with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/pages/Categories: Admin page to list, search, sort, add, edit, delete, and reorder categories using React Query and modals. Includes filtering, optimistic actions, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/pages/ImportPage: Handles drag‑and‑drop JSON import for products and categories with validation, previews, and automatic bulk import. Supports error reporting and import summaries.
frontend/src/components/pages/ProductsPa: Admin product management page with search, filters, pagination, and CRUD operations. Supports toggling stock, featured status, and modal-driven editing.
frontend/src/components/pages/StoreDetai: Form-driven page to view and edit store details, hours, coordinates, and banner image with compression. Loads existing data and supports saving or resetting changes.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product card with image loading fallback, basic product info, and navigation to the product page.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetailMod: Modal that displays product details with focus trapping, ESC handling, scroll lock, and fallback UI for missing fields.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetailVie: Renders detailed product info with image handling, sharing, copy actions, and WhatsApp contact options.
frontend/src/components/ProductModal.tsx: Form modal for creating or editing products, supporting image upload/compression and category selection.
frontend/src/components/PublicHeader.tsx: Public site header with logo, navigation links, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/PublicLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, footer, routed content, and conditional cookie consent banner.
frontend/src/components/SafeSelect.tsx: Select wrapper enforcing sentinel values to avoid empty-string errors, plus utility functions for handling them.
frontend/src/components/SearchBar.tsx: Search component with debounced queries, autocomplete results, full results view, and product detail modal integration.
frontend/src/components/SidebarNavigatio: Sidebar component rendering admin navigation items with active state and mobile overlay.
frontend/src/components/StoreBanner.tsx: Displays store banner with static imagery and dynamic WhatsApp link from store details.
frontend/src/components/Toast.tsx: Toast component handling auto-dismiss timers, pause-on-hover behavior, and type-specific styles/icons.
frontend/src/components/ToastContainer.t: Container that renders all active toasts from the toast store.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes. Supports anonymous mode and secret admin initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and stored identity restoration using AuthClient. Manages authentication state and exposes identity to consumers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements React Query hooks for user profiles, admin status, roles, categories, and products with stable actor handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useToast.ts: Provides a simple wrapper exposing success, error, warning, and info toast helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables for light/dark modes, and detailed toast component styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, React Query, and Internet Identity context.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRoute.tsx: Route guard that checks authentication and admin status, rendering login, loading, denied, or nested routes.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Displays a category with infinite-scroll product loading, cleanup of related queries, and product detail modal support.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders store contact info with loading/error handling and formatted phone, WhatsApp, and map links.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows store banner, search, category previews, and a product modal with initial loading and cleanup of category queries.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: React page that displays the store's privacy policy using store details and static sections, scrolling to top on mount.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Product detail page that fetches product, category, and store data, manages loading/error states, updates page title, and cleans related queries on unmount.
frontend/src/stores/toastStore.ts: Zustand store managing toast notifications with add, remove, pause, and resume actions plus helper functions for common toast types.
frontend/src/utils/ApiResponseHandler.ts: Utility for standardized API response handling with BigInt parsing, error normalization, and automatic error-type generation.
frontend/src/utils/BigIntSerializer.ts: Helpers to safely stringify and parse JSON with BigInt support, including validation and automatic BigInt field conversion.
frontend/src/utils/NumericConverter.ts: Functions to safely convert values to numbers and validate IVA and profit margin inputs with Spanish locale support.
frontend/src/utils/phoneFormatter.ts: Provides functions to clean phone numbers for WhatsApp API and format them into Spanish display style.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/src/workers/session-worker.js: Web worker that periodically sends keep‑alive messages by emitting synthetic mousemove events.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and container settings with plugins.
project_state.json: Project state describing current feature requirements, constraints, and architectural notes for ongoing work.
